body: Also, if it really turns out to be too expensive for some reason, we could effectively pack the weak refcount together with regular refcount in a single integer having e.g. 3B for strong and 1B for weak refs (but I'd really treat that as a last resort).
body_html: Also, if it really turns out to be too expensive for some reason, we could effectively pack the weak refcount together with regular refcount in a single integer having e.g. 3B for strong and 1B for weak refs (but I'd really treat that as a last resort).
body_text: Also, if it really turns out to be too expensive for some reason, we could effectively pack the weak refcount together with regular refcount in a single integer having e.g. 3B for strong and 1B for weak refs (but I'd really treat that as a last resort).
